item.title: Calculating Landolt C ring size based on the visual acuity
item.description: Landolt Ring Tiny Python script to calculate the size (5d) in meters of a Landolt C ring based on the visual acuity belonging to that ring. # determine Landolt C ring size based on decimal visual acuity scales # argument: visual acuity [0.1 ... 3] # result: size of Landolt C ring (5d in the image) (in meters) # http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/de/2/27/Landoltring.jpg import math, sys # distance from ring in meters distance = 5 print 2*distance*math.
